TEXT.S: Amirika' hya' ga cyux maki' tay 38 00 N, 97 00 W na pemeco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 9,833,517 sq km (maki' tay 3ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 9,147,593 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 685,924 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 323,995,528. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga44.50 , lhlahuy hya' ga 33.30 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 22.20 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Washington, DC. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 4 na tay mpitu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Joe Biden, aring ryax 20 squ byacing tay 1 sa kawas 2021 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
